channel.title: Can't run a server bcus my firewall doesnt work? help please
channel.description: I had before a rs2 server.. but i now coded alot of new feathures on my source and want to run it back. But i have port forwarded, opened the classpath and path and got jdk and no-ip and all. But its not on. Than ppl should say. Open ur ffirewall.. but my firewall doesnt work, it doesnt open. So it can't block my port. So why it doesnt work. Or does anybody know how i can re-install my [WINDOWS] firewall again? (no, not another firewall)

item.title: Can't run a server bcus my firewall doesnt work? help please
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

If Avast is the only FireWall going then yes, add 43594 as an alowed port.

Read full topic
